text: This is an incomplete list of Top of the Pops television presenters from 1964 to 2006. Most of them were also BBC Radio 1 disc jockey's. * Tony Blackburn * Pete Brady * Simon Dee * Noel Edmonds * David Jacobs * Pete Murray * John Peel * Jimmy Savile * Dave Lee Travis * Tommy Vance Category:British television presenters
title: List of Top of the Pops presenters
